message:
SYSTEM: PlanetData_SIMON_OEGPresentation_oct16.pdf: Página 5
Background
Storm - http://storm.incubator.apache.org/
⚫
Distributed system for real-time processing of 
streams
⚫
Why Storm? 
⚫
Simple processing model (parallelization)
⚫
Open source community backing the project
⚫
Used by relevant companies, e.g. Twitter.
Lambda Architecture
⚫
Batch layer: stores ALL the incoming data in an 
immutable master dataset and pre-computes batch 
views on historic data.
⚫
Serving layer: indexes views on the master dataset.
speaker: SYSTEM
